author: {'steamid': '76561198399885394', 'num_games_owned': 118, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 247, 'last_played': 1585396930}
review:
THE BEST WORMS for now in my opinion. 10/10

Worms Clan Wars preserves the classic charm of the Worms series with its turn-based strategic gameplay and quirky humor. The addition of clan support enhances the multiplayer experience, fostering team dynamics and competition. The extensive customization options, from team names to worm outfits, add a delightful touch. While the core gameplay remains true to the series, some may find that the formula hasn't evolved significantly. Nevertheless, the entertaining arsenal of weapons and the ability to create custom landscapes contribute to the game's replayability. Worms Clan Wars is a nostalgic and enjoyable experience, particularly for those who appreciate the franchise's signature blend of strategy and silliness.

author: {'steamid': '76561198276251740', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 1450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1374, 'last_played': 1701553794}
review:
A turn-based strategy game about worms using a plethora of different weapons to blow up each other alongside the landscape.

[hr][/hr]
If you‚Äôre not familiar with the classic Worms formular, this game basically has you control a group of worms who are placed in a two-dimensional landscape. Up to 4 pllayers take turns controlling one of their worms to move around the map and use one of a variety of weapons to damage other players‚Äô worms. This goes on until only one player has worms left, making them the winner of the match.

There‚Äôs quite a large variety of weapons with wildly different effects, ranging from basic grenades and bazookas all the way to flame throwers, air strikes and exploding old ladies. In addition, there are also various support items, aiding you in moving your worms, setting up defensive structures and more. Crates are spawned every round, providing you with additional items, money to buy specific items with or health.

Combined, all of this makes for rather chaotic matches, which are enhanced by the gameplay being very physics-based, often leading to basic attacks triggering wacky interactions and/or chain reactions. With that said, Worms Clan Wars‚Äô offers a lot of skill-based mechanics to master, such as aiming projectiles to account for their different trajectories and the way wind may influence them. That way, the game usually manages to strike a good balance between requiring skillful play and having randomness shake up the match, which makes for a lot of fun overall.

Clan Wars inherits the gameplay additions introduced in its predecessor Worms Revolution, adding physics objects and simulated water to maps. Each of your worms can also freely be assigned one of four classes, mixing up their abilities and adding some additional strategic elements. Clan Wars refines these features and adds some new items.

I‚Äôd suggest getting a few friends on board to get the most out of Clan Wars. Given the game‚Äôs age and the availability of never titles, the online modes are sadly basically dead and the bot AI is just too basic to play to the game‚Äôs full strength.

Aside from the multiplayer modes, there‚Äôs also a single-player campaign encompassing 25 levels, most of which put a unique spin on the basic gameplay. This campaign features some light and mostly non-sensical storytelling voice acted by Katherine Parkinson, who does a phenomenal job delivering the genuinely absurd dialogue. In a similar vein, there are an additional 10 ‚ÄúWorm Ops‚Äù-missions, featuring similar gameplay variations while challenging you to complete them as quickly as possible.

In typical Worms fashion, the game offers a lot of customization, letting you create custom maps with a powerful editor and create your own rulesets. For the later, you‚Äôre allowed to set various timers, adjust crate spawns, change map properties and select which items are available among other things. You can also name your worms and equip them with a number of cosmetics and voice line packs, with more of either being available through the Steam Workshop for the first time in the game series.

The updated visuals of Clan Wars barely show their age thanks to the fitting cartoonish style used, with the interface in particular feeling playful, yet snappy and readable. This is also complemented by some good if not too outstanding background music. As with the aforementioned narration, the game oozes charm, most noticeably through the worms‚Äô animations, voice lines and of course the rather wacky weapons.

From a technical perspective, Worms Clan Wars sadly also comes with a couple of problems. For one, I had issues with tabbing out of its window resulting in crashes or the game becoming unresponsive to my inputs. Similarly, starting a match sometimes just crashes the game. In addition to these mostly avoidable obstacles, you may also encounter some glitches related to the game‚Äôs physics from time to time, like water catapulting objects or placed items floating through the level. While these mostly served to amuse me and my friend group I can very much see them annoying more competitive people.

[hr][/hr]
With all that said, I very much enjoy playing Worms Clan Wars and will recommend you give it a try if you‚Äôve got someone to play with.

author: {'steamid': '76561198802348131', 'num_games_owned': 44, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 8151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8119, 'last_played': 1700320630}
review:
Play locally with my friends and family every now and then. There is some rare glitches/bugs where you can get a worm stuck in the walls, sent to millions of miles away etc, but those bugs are rare, and when they happen, they are more funny than anything else, at least in the context of playing IRL with friends&families. No idea how the online multiplayer works, if it even still works.

The only boring bug is when you get soft-locked in the water, where your worm move in the water with some items, creating almost end-less water waves and movement, which soft-lock the game because the end turn doesn't transition to the next in that situation until the water and items stops moving. I say soft-locked but I never encountered a direct soft-lock, the longest it took was 10 minutes of water movements, with the worms etc going back and forth with the water wave, which was quite the circus.

So yeah, out of all the Worms game, that one is a classic, and a good one. You might encounter bugs/glitches once every 2 to 3 hours, but don't recall any crash or actual game-breaking issue.

review:
Worms Clan Wars ist f√ºr mich ein nostalgisches und unterhaltsames Strategiespiel, das die charmante und chaotische Welt der Worms-Franchise auf eine neue Ebene hebt. Als Fan der Worms-Spiele seit meiner Kindheit hat mich dieses Spiel von Anfang an fasziniert.

Die einzigartige Mischung aus rundenbasiertem Gameplay und humorvollen Waffen ist in Worms Clan Wars weiterhin hervorragend umgesetzt. Die M√∂glichkeit, ein Team von W√ºrmern zu befehligen und gegen Freunde oder KI-gesteuerte Gegner anzutreten, sorgt f√ºr stundenlangen Spielspa√ü.

Die Vielzahl der Waffen und Gadgets in Worms Clan Wars ist beeindruckend und sorgt f√ºr abwechslungsreiche taktische Herausforderungen. Vom klassischen Bazooka-Schuss bis hin zu absurden Waffen wie der heiligen Handgranate gibt es immer etwas Neues zu entdecken.

Der Mehrspielermodus ist ein H√∂hepunkt des Spiels, da er die M√∂glichkeit bietet, sich mit Freunden in hitzigen Schlachten zu messen. Die Kombination aus Teamarbeit und gegnerischen Listigkeiten macht die Matches besonders spannend.

Die M√∂glichkeit, eigene Wurm-Teams anzupassen und individuelle W√ºrmer zu erstellen, tr√§gt zur Personalisierung des Spielerlebnisses bei.

Es ist jedoch zu beachten, dass Worms Clan Wars, wie viele Worms-Spiele, eine gewisse Lernkurve hat, und das Beherrschen der verschiedenen Waffen und Techniken kann einige Zeit in Anspruch nehmen.

Zusammengefasst ist Worms Clan Wars f√ºr mich ein lustiges und unterhaltsames Strategiespiel, das den traditionellen Charme der Worms-Franchise bewahrt und gleichzeitig neue M√∂glichkeiten f√ºr kreative K√§mpfe bietet. Es ist ideal, um mit Freunden zu spielen und gemeinsam Lacher zu ernten, w√§hrend man versucht, die W√ºrmer des Gegners zu besiegen. Worms Clan Wars hat definitiv einen festen Platz in meiner Sammlung von Multiplayer-Spielen.

review:
üêõ Worms Clan Wars to gra z gatunku strategicznych platform√≥wek z elementami zrƒôczno≈õciowymi. A w skr√≥cie totalna destrukcja z udzia≈Çem ≈õmiesznych robali.
  
üêõ Grafika. Co≈õ w stylu 2.5 D ze wzglƒôdu na perspektywƒô oraz wielowymiarowe modele, daje ona fajne poczucie g≈Çƒôbi, kolory sƒÖ nieco przygaszone co akurat na du≈ºy minus. Nie jest to najgorsza oprawa wizualna, ma sw√≥j urok, lecz nie przypad≈Ça mi do gustu. 

üêõ Audio. Ca≈Çkiem dobre. Pasuje do klimatu gry. W opcjach mo≈ºemy nawet wybraƒá pakiet d≈∫wiƒôkowy dla naszych postaci. 

üêõ Otoczenie. Jest dosyƒá r√≥≈ºnorodne, wyb√≥r mapek jest ograniczony, ale jednak wystarczajƒÖcy. WystƒôpujƒÖ mapki otwarte i zamkniƒôte. 

üêõ Fizyka. Nasi bohaterowie sƒÖ do≈õƒá ciƒô≈ºcy do opanowania. Dos≈Çownie ...wa≈ºƒÖ chyba z tonƒô. Skakanie jest nie wygodne, aczkolwiek model poruszania postaci przypad≈Ç mi do gustu, wyglƒÖda ca≈Çkiem nie≈∫le. Od takie ma≈Çe skaczƒÖce niezdarnie glutki. Powierzchnie sta≈Çe, gazy jak i ciecze pod wp≈Çywem interakcji zachowujƒÖ siƒô do≈õƒá realistycznie i spektakularnie. Szczeg√≥lnie zabawny jest rozbryzg wody. 

üêõ Interfejs. Jest 2D. Zawiera sporo niestandardowych opcji jak np: mo≈ºliwo≈õci edytowania naszej dru≈ºyny robak√≥w. Jest animowany i posiada d≈∫wiƒôki, gdy go u≈ºywamy. Obrazek w menu nie jest do ko≈Ñca czytelny, co jest akurat minusem. 

üêõ Fabu≈Ça jest, co by nie m√≥wiƒá na pewno oryginalna. Opowiada o szalonym hipnotyzerze, kt√≥ry zaw≈ÇadnƒÖ≈Ç robakami znajdujƒÖcymi siƒô w muzeum. Przez co panuje tam totalny chaos. Tylko my mamy mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá uratowania tego miejsca. W tym celu musimy przej≈õƒá przez oko≈Ço 20 r√≥≈ºnych poziom√≥w wymiatajƒÖc po drodze wszystkie robaki, by odnale≈∫ƒá mitycznƒÖ marchewkƒô oraz z≈Çotego robala. Poza misjami fabularnymi istniejƒÖ r√≥wnie≈º misje specjalne.

üêõ Rozgrywka. Polega na wykonywaniu na zmianƒô z przeciwnikiem ruch√≥w naszym robakiem/robakami. Wyb√≥r broni oraz narzƒôdzi u≈ÇatwiajƒÖcych nam rozgrywkƒô jest zadowalajƒÖcy. Mamy mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá grania online, grania z jednego urzƒÖdzenia lub samemu. Dostƒôpna jest tak≈ºe opcja za≈Ço≈ºenia swojego w≈Çasnego klanu i toczenia za≈ºartych pojedynk√≥w z wrogimi klanami. Podczas gry parƒô razy natknƒô≈Çam siƒô na irytujƒÖcy b≈ÇƒÖd. Zdarzy≈Ço siƒô to w trybie multiplayer - bez powodu wywala≈Ço grƒô, jednak poza tym nie zauwa≈ºy≈Çam ≈ºadnych innych problem√≥w.

üêõ Cena. Moim zdaniem jest trochƒô za wysoka. W sezonowych przecenach wychodzi jednak bardzo korzystnie.


üêõ PodsumowujƒÖc jest to zabawna gierka, w kt√≥rej mo≈ºna mi≈Ço spƒôdziƒá czas na wzajemnej rozwa≈Çce z ekipkƒÖ. Ewentualnie samemu zmierzyƒá siƒô z ciekawymi misjami. Nie jest to jednak na tyle wciƒÖgajƒÖca gra by spƒôdziƒá w niej mn√≥stwo godzin. Jest raczej mi≈Çym przerywnikiem podczas d≈Çu≈ºszych sesji spƒôdzonej w innej grze.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098975172', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 246, 'playtime_forever': 1076, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1076, 'last_played': 1475343616}
review:
A proper blast to play with a bunch of friends. It may be a bit of an older game, but for the price you can get it, especially when on sale, it is the best value for money out of the entire Worms franchise.

There are a bunch of customisation options, maps and weapons that are sure to keep things interesting for quite a while.

review:
Worms Clan Wars kann sich in der Reihe der Worms-Spiele behaupten.

Die Singleplayer-Missionen sind angenehm abwechslungsreich und haben Checkpoints, was einen stundenlangen Grind verhindert.
Ansonsten ist das Spiel wie jedes andere Worms Spiel solide im Multiplayer und im Versus.

Der Clanwarsaspekt kann nicht gewertet werden, da wie bei vielen √§lteren Spielen der Multiplayer und damit das Ranked-System ausstirbt. Dies ist auch hier der Fall.

Die Sprecherin ist absolut fantastisch!



[b]Story:[/b] 7/10
[b]Spielmechanik:[/b] 7/10
[b]Atmosph√§re:[/b] 6/10
[b]Grafik:[/b] 4/10
[b]Errungenschaften[/b]: 7/10

[b][i]Gesamtwertung:[/i][/b] 7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198126999992', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 165, 'last_played': 1435437182}

author: {'steamid': '76561198258467884', 'num_games_owned': 399, 'num_reviews': 149, 'playtime_forever': 862, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 862, 'last_played': 1676910330}
review:
Honestly don't think this is worth buying. It seems to just be an improved version of Revolution but if you already own that (and you might if you picked up Worms Revolution Gold Edition from that one GOG free giveaway recently) then there's no point in picking this up as the changes aren't drastic enough.

 Besides, this seems to have an even lower player count on Steam than most of the other Worms games so it's not going to be a good option for online.
 I'd recommend getting Worms WMD or Worms Armageddon for that instead instead.

I also wouldn't really recommend getting this for the campaign, it's pretty dry, as is the case for the Worms games.

From my personal experience, I'm not a big fan of some of the changes this one has (plenty were carried over from Revolution tbf) as it deviates from what I am used to out of the Worms games. The ninja rope in particular was a point of frustration for me, it was very easy to get stuck on walls when using the stupid thing due to its' wonky physics.

You might get some fun out of this if you and your friends happen to all own this game for some reason, or you want to do a local game when some people are over. Otherwise, look at the other Worms games.

review:
This game looks fun, and my friends have enjoyed it in the past, so I thought I'd get it and join...

It is visually hellish. Some menus are fine, some are literally un-seeable. The screen is covered varying shades of pink a lot of the time, and while trying to find something that would fix it, it blue screened my PC.

Cannot recommend. Seems like it could be fun but I cannot recommend a product that doesn't function.

author: {'steamid': '76561199124112606', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1677267616}
review:
Opino que es un juego genial para jugar con amigos. Me ha tra√≠do muchos recuerdos de cuando jugaba la versi√≥n cl√°sica en aquella √©poca que ni si quiera iba al instituto (nacido en 1989). Lo bueno es que trae la misma esencia, es el mismo juego para jugar cooperativamente pero con los gr√°ficos mejorados. Adem√°s, en workshop hay much√≠simas cosas por descargar que lo mejoran (hasta voces de chiquito de la calzada) y eso  lo hace mucho m√°s divertido. 
En contra tengo que decir que si no coges a tiempo una ofertaza del 90 %, no creo que os valga la pena.. Para echar un rato solo en modo historia o con mini retos, est√° entretenido, pero lo que siempre me ha gustado m√°s de este juego es el jugar contra otros amigos. En el modo online tampoco hay nunca conectado hoy en d√≠a.. Me falta probar el remote play together a ver qu√© tal funciona.
En definitiva, muy recomendado por la nostalgia y para echar un rato con los amigos en casa (¬°si tienen tiempo y paciencia en aprender movimientos + armas!) y sobretodo si hay una oferta muy buena. Los 25 ‚Ç¨ aprox. que tiene normalmente, no vale para nada la pena y menos si nunca puedes jugar online con otros clanes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196818634', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 192, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1545050119}
review: I am a 40 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single father to my Son, who is 13 now. My son got this game for Christmas in 2021 from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just watching YouTube. So I decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. I loved it as it was the best time I had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories.

author: {'steamid': '76561198193918619', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1519, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1449, 'last_played': 1698058356}
review: I am a 50 yo father, probably one of the oldest people playing this game. I am a single farther to my Son, who is 14 now. My son got this game for Christmas from his uncle, so we installed it on his computer and he started playing. By the end of the week he had 24 hours on this game. This was horrible for me, as it was already hard for me to find ways to spend time with my son, as he is always out with his friends or just, watching YouTube. So i decided to make a Steam account and get this game to see if I could maybe play alongside him. loaded into the game, made my character and world and started playing but I was stuck on what you where supposed to do. I asked my Son for help and he hosted a game for me to join. loved it as it was the best time had spent with my Son since my wife had died. This game has ever since brought me and my son closer again and now we actually spend time together outside the house together as well. This game reminded me that there's fun to be had in everything, and it has brought both me and my Son many happy memories

author: {'steamid': '76561198120530775', 'num_games_owned': 3369, 'num_reviews': 338, 'playtime_forever': 1998, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1998, 'last_played': 1663688580}
review:
Good one. This is a physics/strategy game. The graphics are nice. The music is OK. The story is simple but funny. 

No bugs or crashes. Runs fine on win 7.

Overall, it is very entertaining. Worms games are always hilarious. The story is silly in a good way and links a relatively long campaign. Some levels are head-scratchers but almost all are pretty casual. Plenty of weapons and tactics to try out. It includes cards and also achievements, but some require PVP or Multiplayer so getting all of them could be tricky. This is one of those games that can be a great choice for the whole family. If you like comedy and suicidal/murderous worms with an attitude, this should be a pleasant gaming experience.

review:
Cel mai bun joc Worms de pe piata. Ce a venit in urma are grafica mai slaba. Ce a venit dupa a introdus elemente noi ce deviaza de la reteta originala Worms de exemplu vehicule si miscare in timp real.

Multiplayer-ul inca functioneaza. Daca vrei Worms 3D joaca Worms Ultimate Mayhem din 2011. Daca vrei Worms 2D joaca Wroms Clan Wars din 2013. Sunt cele mai bune jocuri worms pe care ai putea sa le gasesti.

A, si are si workshop.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067389025', 'num_games_owned': 144, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 2135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1632, 'last_played': 1664916961}
review:
Multiplayer: Worms Clan Wars ist f√ºr mich vom Gameplay gesehen das beste Worms das ich kenne! Das freie Spiel macht richtig Laune und die M√∂glichkeiten alle Optionen anzupassen, geben dem Spieler wirklich Freiraum f√ºr Variation. Zusammen mit Freunden ist es wirklich ein Fest. Super Spiel und ohne die Kampagne w√ºrde es von mir auch eine 10 von 10 bekommen.

Singleplayer: Tara (die Erz√§hlerin der Story) ist wirklich lustig und quasi das einzig wirklich Positive an der Story meiner Meinung nach, denn: Welcher Autist hat sich diese Kampagne ausgedacht? Mein Gott war das ein Herumgewuppe mit der Steuerung und ich wollte noch nie so sehr mein Lineal zum Abmessen der Flugbahnen herausholen, wie in dieser Kampagne. Manche Level sind einfach nur da um den Spieler ma√ülos abzufucken (weil irgend so eine jump-and-run-Parkour-Schei√üe UNBEDINGT im Spiel sein muss). Au√üerdem musst du manche Level JA GENAUSO IN DER REIHENFOLGE DURCHSPIELEN wie es sich die Entwickler vorgestellt haben (also wenn du das Level doch schaffst, aber die Reihenfolge nicht einh√§ltst, triggert die Cutscene nicht.). Das musste wirklich nicht sein in 1-2 Level. Gegen Ende gingen ein paar Level wieder ganz in Ordnung.

Aber auch hier gibt es wieder eine Ausnahme: (folglich Spoiler zum letzten Level) - [spoiler] Der Endbossfight gegen Mesmer k√∂nnte fast nicht langweiliger sein, dennoch zieht er sich (wie quasi jedes Level in der zweiten H√§lfte der Story). Also verkackst du irgendwo und stirbst, nur um alles wieder von vorne zu machen oder du kommst relativ ez durch bis du einem wehrlosen Wurm gegen√ºbetrittst, der noch weniger Reaktionen zeigt als der Endboss von Demon Souls. Du musst ihn dann einfach nur ein paar mal abschie√üen und das wars dann. Ganz ehrlich, alles davor war deutlich schwieriger und rundet die ganze Shitshow eigentlich nur noch richtig ab. [/spoiler]

Also lasst die Kampagne am besten links liegen. Der freie Modus ist das wovon Worms Clan Wars lebt, und das ist auch gut so. 9 von 10 Punkte

author: {'steamid': '76561198158721869', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 2379, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1707761157}
review:
To be brief, as a veteran of the franchise, Clan Wars feels stiff and frustrating to play when held next to other titles.
On its own merits, it's not *too* bad, but it does things worse than other games in the series without much to make up for it. This makes it hard to recommend, aside for if you're interested in exploring the franchise's history.
If you're just looking for a 2D Worms experience, Armageddon and WMD are here to fill that need much better.

-

Now for the less brief, why I think it falls short of other titles:

The most important aspect of an artillery game like Worms is simple: the readability, the physics and the precision. Clan Wars feels lacking in these aspects, trying to move, to aim, to enact strategies... it all feels imprecise, and so the gameplay will often feel frustrating.

The physics and friction feel off, quite janky even. It's something hard to explain without playing and getting a feel for it, but the gist is that collisions feel unreliable.
The most egregious exemple is with the Ninja Rope, using it will very frequently result in getting randomly stuck to walls, ceilings, floors and PARTICULARLY corners, sometimes the rope will even hit itself over nothing. But in general, you'll find that Worms unreasonably stick to surfaces, walls especially, so you can't have fun using wall bounces in your strategies, which sucks.
There are plenty of small instances where the unreliable collisions will screw you. Like launching a grenade straight up next to a Worm, it goes just fine on the way up, but on the way down it will bounce off the Worm's head and away, despite it not obstructing the trajectory on the way up. Sometimes you'll blow up a Worm and launch it somewhere where you think it will bounce off/silde, only for it to safely land on a >80¬∞ surface just fine. Other times you're using the Super Sheep and the camera lagging behind makes you crash into a wall you didn't have the time to react to.
Where I'm getting at is that it end up being a "death by a thousand cuts" situation.

In my opinion, the game's 2.5D style tanks the precision.
The 3D of the terrain and lack of defined outlines really muddy the visibility of the shape of the landscape. I think this goes hand-in-hand with the janky collisions, it all feels flimsy and unreliable.
I'm also convinced that the 3D messes with the alignment of the crosshair, due to the visual distortion caused by being in a 3D perspective - aligning your shots feels pretty shoddy compared to other Worms games.
Basically, the addition of 3D does not do much besides diminishing the clarity and precision, and making the game needlessly more frustrating to play.

Speaking of gameplay, Clan Wars does offer its own gimmicks.
The terrain objects with physics and unique properties can certainly be fun to play with, and so are the water particles and items. They add new options in the gameplay and some new layer of strategy..
Outside of that, Worm classes might force in some strategy elements, but they really just get in the way more than anything else ("Wait, how much damage does this weapon do with this class?", "What? I really wasn't expecting the knockback to be like that with this guy!").
They make the game less flexible and meets you with new frequent problems you wish you didn't have to deal with.

As a last aside, I'm going to gloss over the weirdness with the game's engine, as I personally don't really understand it. But I do want to point it out to say that whatever is going on with the framerate doesn't help the feeling of stiffness/choppiness the game has. I've also encountered a handful of crashes.


All in all, the bottom line is that Worms Clan Wars feels worse to play than many other games in the franchise, and what unique things it has don't make it worth coming back to.
Ignore it and move along. Again, if you want to play a 2D Worms, get either Armageddon or WMD.

review: This isn't my favorite Worms experience, but definitely a fun time if you love the series. Water is still pretty interesting and the classes have gotten some significant balance and strategy changes. I enjoyed the new stuff, but at the end of the relatively short single player campaign I didn't feel there was anything more to do. This is still a good Worms game, so try it.

review: Playing was unbelievably nostalgic. I loved playing this game on my Nintendo DS lite as a child and enjoy it just as much now as an adult. Playing this game with friends is a joy. It never get boring with the abundance of interesting weapons and equipment at your disposal. Even with nuclear weapons and meteor strikes, nothing beats getting that perfectly placed grenade shot which blows your opponent off the map.

author: {'steamid': '76561198308518676', 'num_games_owned': 80, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 3258, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3245, 'last_played': 1669996826}
review:
El Worms de siempre pero con gr√°ficos nuevos.

¬°A matar gusanos!

[h1][u]PROS[/u][/h1]

Muy buena mejora en los gr√°ficos. Son casi 3D durante el juego sin llegar a serlo.

La m√∫sica no pod√≠a fallar tampoco as√≠ como las frases de los gusanos.

La f√≠sica es muy buena. Minas que rebotan, agua que fluye, llamas de fuego...

En el men√∫ tienes un ampl√≠simo manual de C√≥mo se juega en el submen√∫ Ayuda y Opciones.
De todas formas lo ir√°s aprendiendo durante el juego en modo historia.

Posibilidad de jugar en Local (Historia, competitivo para hacer un mapa o contra la m√°quina) o Multijugador.

[h1][u]CONTRAS[/u][/h1]

Ninguno en particular salvo que en Linux se queda congelada la pantalla de carga tras pasarte un nivel (o querer reintentarlo).

[h1][u]CONCLUSI√ìN[/u][/h1]

Muy buen juego para reirte un rato con los amigos mientras os tirais bazocazos o cualquier otra arma.

La compra recomendada con rebaja.

As√≠ que lo marcar√© con el pulgar hacia arriba.

[h1][u]RECOMENDACIONES[/u][/h1]

Como siempre, recomiendo ir haciendo copias entre sesiones de juego del directorio de saves.

[u]Linux[/u]
<Steam-folder>/userdata/<SteamID>/233840

[u]Windows[/u]
<Steam-folder>/userdata/<SteamID>/233840

author: {'steamid': '76561197996644633', 'num_games_owned': 339, 'num_reviews': 339, 'playtime_forever': 2221, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 499, 'last_played': 1670781706}
review:
This game is hilariously fun with friends, You will see this game almost every steam sale there is.

Fun little platformer vs AI/friends that can be enjoyed through the ages.

Not much else can be said about this  title, this would be ideal for being played only with other Real players with or against AI.

Bottom Line: Wait for a sale and get this or any of the other Worms titles!

review: The whole clan stuff is not for me, as I'm not much of an online gamer, but the story mode is enjoyable, and humorous. The presentation is similar looking to Worms Revolution, which is to say it looks nice, if not taxing on the graphical prowess. It also features the class mechanic from Worms Revolution, which I still don't fully understand how the classes change anything up in the game-play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043331393', 'num_games_owned': 211, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 1363, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1363, 'last_played': 1605772708}
review: I got this because worms reminds me of pocket tanks. I did not realize this game was more complicated than that. The game is challenging in various ways from discovering the fastest way to do things to the safest way to navigate a puzzle. Eventually get to a point where everything had to be almost perfect and found myself resetting often. While this is frustrating at times I never felt cheated because the AI will usually repeat the same steps over and over allowing me to modify each run slightly differently.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052641086', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 3723, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1338, 'last_played': 1688253372}
review:
I have bought WCW to play with a friend that owns it, too. I have 70+ hours on worms revolutions, and - well, it's the same game, with a few tweaks here and there. Also, it's still buggy, worms can get caught in a perpetual motion washing mashine. They removed the jingle that used to play when your hit someone off the map with a baseball bat. The campaign was kinda fun, but short.  
All in all, pick it up if you have a friend and you can get it or the key on a budget. I got it for 3 bucks, so i can't really complain. But I do anyway. Customisation menu for weapons and settings sucks monkeyballs, too.   
The more i think about it, the more i want to play Revolutions instead.

review: It's a Worms game where you're shooting bazooka's, shotguns, and sheep at other worms to defeat them. Nothing new here and nothing wrong with that. Graphics and sounds aren't breath-taking, but you're not here for that. Just be aware that if you play the single-player campaign, be prepared for impossible AI shots and missions of complete frustration mixed with missions of complete fun.

review: Le principal int√™ret du jeu est le multijoueur online. Or, celui-ci est d√©sert. L'id√©e de faire une √©quipe avec worms tank,scientifique, agilit√© et normal) est bonne mais elle est trop sous exploit√© √† mon go√ªt (car cela se ressent juste dans leur d√©placement et quand ils meurent). L'optimisation n'est pas terrible, on a des chutes de FPS m√™me sur de bons PC. Pour tout cela, mais surtout parce que ce worms est trop orient√© multijoueur online. Je ne peux pas le recommander.

author: {'steamid': '76561198993898609', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1324, 'last_played': 1597494919}
review:
Short: Nostalgic wars.

In Detail: Well when this game was new, it had several improvements, nice gameplay and relative OK campaign to go along with it (challenges are not very interesting to be honest). For it's time, it was game to be recommended and played for all who like this type of game.

From this perspective, it didn't age that good, graphics are really not ageing well and design that goes with it, doesn't improve experience. Movement and mechanics of the game are also not very well but it is playable and for all people who are curios about this game but never played it before, I really don't recommend (this is the reason for my suggestion) it since it doesn't have too much to offer to new people, I would recommend some new version of this game to start with it. 

On the other hand if you want to play it, voice acting and humor is really good. if you have few friends to play with them it can be enjoyable. Weapons and gadgets are versatile which will make each game more interesting in the retrospective. For all the editors there, there is rather fine level editor which can make thing better if you wish to play with it.

So in conclusion, if you are new to this type of game or Worms franchise in general, try some never game but for all who want to join nostalgic wagon, hop on and join the ride (although again i would recommend some sale).

review:
Un d√≠a "navegando" por una de esas p√°ginas que venden claves de productos de Steam, me top√© con una oferta de un Worms, que no era otro que este "Clan Wars". Si bien no lo conoc√≠a, el precio econ√≥mico sumado al recuerdo de los Worms que jugu√© en mi adolescencia (World Party y Armageddon) hicieron que no dudara mucho en hacer "clic" en la mencionada oferta. A√∫n no llego a haber jugado dos horas al juego, pero son suficientes para decir: NO RECOMIENDO.
Si bien el juego mantiene el humor y la mec√°nica de los cl√°sicos, la parte gr√°fica es espantosamente tosca e incomoda. Apuntaron por unos gr√°ficos nuevos que solo entorpecen. No entiendo por que cambiar lo que funciona tan bien, al menos en este tipo de juego no me parecen necesarios los gr√°ficos en 3d, con 2d es m√°s que suficiente.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965215862', 'num_games_owned': 4209, 'num_reviews': 522, 'playtime_forever': 957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 957, 'last_played': 1503087429}
review:
[h1]üéÆ [u]Worms Clan Wars[/u] üéÆ [/h1] 

Der Klassiker vom Spielprinzip in der Worms-Spielereihe, entwickelt und publiziert von [url=https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Team17?snr=1_5_9__2000]Team 17 DIgital Ltd[/url]. Eine verbesserte und √ºberarbeitete Version des Vorg√§ngers "[i]Worms: Revolution[/i]".

[b]Gameplay[/b] 

Wir steuern unseren Trupp von W√ºrmern und m√ºssen auf einer Art Reise verschiedene Level meistern. Dabei gilt es die K.I. zu besiegen, indem man allerlei Waffen aus seinem Arsenal verwendet und die feindlichen W√ºrmer so t√∂tet, durch Zerst√∂rung der Welt daf√ºr sorgt, dass diese ein √§hnliches Schicksal erleiden oder sie schlicht in die Leere fallen. So wie man es kennt und liebt!

Dabei erfolgt die Steuerung √ºber Maus und Tastatur und damit das Ganze nicht zu leicht ist, gibt es nat√ºrlich auch einen Timer. Es gilt schnell, pr√§zise und t√∂dlich zu sein. Spa√üiger ist das Spiel nat√ºrlich gegen menschliche Spieler im lokalen oder online Multiplayer. F√ºr das Erf√ºllen der Story gibt es allerdings auch einfach zu verdienende Errungenschaften und zum Lernen des Spiels, damit man gegen erfahrenere Spieler nicht g√§nzlich baden geht, durchaus zu gebrauchen.

[b]Grafik & Sound[/b] 

Die Grafik ist selbstverst√§ndlich im Comic-Stil und durch die runden Darstellungen sehr knuddelig/knuffig. Das ist aber schon seit jeher der Charme der Spielereihe und es wirkt auch irgendwie "s√º√ü", wenn die kleinen W√ºrmer sterben und ihr Grabstein erscheint. Die Hintergrundbilder sind in Ordnung, die Zerst√∂rung der Welt und die Animationen stimmig. Akustisch sind die kurzen, aber pr√§gnanten √Ñu√üerungen der W√ºrmer belustigend. Ansonsten ist die Hintergrundmusik recht dezent; man beschr√§nkt sich aufs Wesentliche. Die Animationssounds sind passend zu dem was grafisch passiert: Keine Beanstandung!

[b]Fazit[/b] 

Oldie but goldie k√∂nnte man zu diesem Titel durchaus sagen. Im Sale f√ºr unter f√ºnf Euro auch kein Titel der noch Unsummen kostet. Besonders empfehlenswert nat√ºrlich, wenn man das Spiel gemeinsam mit Freunden spielen kann. Deshalb gibt es hier auch ein Viererpack zu kaufen. Dann potenziert sich das Vergn√ºgen exponentiell und es rentiert sich noch mehr. Kaufempfehlung meinerseits zu rabattierten Konditionen!

[i]Wenn ihr an weiteren Reviews von mir interessiert seid oder meine Arbeit unterst√ºtzen wollt, dann folgt meiner [url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/GermanReviewGroup]Gruppe[/url] und/oder der [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/32139821/]Kuration[/url][/i].

review:
[b]Worms Clan Wars[/b] to ciekawy tytu≈Ç, prezentujƒÖcy klasyczny, ju≈º dobrze znany fanom serii gier worms schemat walki miƒôdzy robakami, tym razem mocno nastawiony na rozgrywki klanowe (online), gry rankingowe. Dodatkowo wr√≥ci≈Ça grafika 3D, kt√≥ra prezentuje siƒô dziwacznie, co jest odczuwalne w rozgrywce ‚Äì wiƒôc ca≈Ço≈õciowo gra robi mieszane uczucia.

[h1]Ale do rzeczy:[/h1]

Tak jak ju≈º wspomnia≈Çem powy≈ºej mamy do czynienia z klasyczna grƒÖ worms, gdzie toczymy b√≥j miƒôdzy konkurujƒÖcymi ze sobƒÖ dru≈ºynami robak√≥w. Wygra ta dru≈ºyna, kt√≥ra wyeliminuje wszystkie robaki przeciwnej dru≈ºyny ‚Äì tu nic siƒô nie zmieni≈Ço.

Aby tego dokonaƒá musimy korzystaƒá z dostƒôpnego nam sprzƒôtu, jak r√≥wnie≈º zbieraƒá skrzyneczki kt√≥re bƒôdƒÖ dodawaƒá nam zab√≥jczy asortyment, leczyƒá nas na polu walki ‚Äì ponownie tu r√≥wnie≈º siƒô nic nie zmieni≈Ço.

Natomiast to co uleg≈Ço zmianie to samo nastawienie i ukierunkowanie gry, pod rozgrywki klanowe, w kt√≥rych gracze mogliby siƒô ≈ÇƒÖczyƒá i walczyƒá z innymi robaczkowymi klanami o dominacje w rankingu ‚Äì tak, gra jest mocno nastawiona pod tym wzglƒôdem, jak r√≥wnie≈º pod pryzmatem spo≈Çeczno≈õciowym. Co nie jest z≈Çym posuniƒôciem, je≈ºeli grupa grajƒÖcych ma wiƒôksze wymagania co do samej rozgrywki, szukajƒÖc wiƒôkszych wra≈ºe≈Ñ oraz wyzwa≈Ñ - a sama kampania, lub tryb potyczek ze znajomymi, mu nie wystarcza.

KolejnƒÖ rzeczƒÖ na kt√≥rƒÖ trzeba zwr√≥ciƒá uwagƒô to oprawa graficzna, kt√≥ra budzi mieszane uczucia ‚Äì ponownie producent gry postanowi≈Ç wr√≥ciƒá do 3D, co moim zdaniem nie wysz≈Ço na dobrze. Grafika jest s≈Çabej jako≈õci, destrukcja otoczenia jest dziwaczna i ma≈Ço precyzyjna ‚Äì b≈Çƒôd√≥w w tej grze nie unikniemy. Z≈Çudzenia wizualne powodowane b≈Çƒôdem grafiki r√≥wnie≈º.

Tw√≥rca zaimplementowa≈Ç zaawansowany silnik fizyki, kt√≥ry daje mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá takim jak woda na swobodne przemieszczanie siƒô, zalewanie lokalizacji do kt√≥rych bƒôdzie mia≈Ça dostƒôp ‚Äì to r√≥wnie≈º dotyczy innych obiekt√≥w na mapie. Mo≈ºna poprzez nasze dzia≈Çania wykorzystaƒá je do walki z przeciwnikiem ‚Äì co jest ciekawym rozwiƒÖzaniem.

Co ciekawe, robaki zostali podzieleni na klasy, ka≈ºda z tych klas posiada inne wewnƒôtrzne statystyki ‚Äì robak ‚Äûm√≥zgowiec‚Äù jest szybki i zwinny lecz ma ma≈Ço ≈ºycia, z czego robak ‚Äûczo≈Çg‚Äù, ma du≈ºo ≈ºycia lecz jest strasznie powolny. Od nas samych bƒôdzie zale≈ºeƒá jak wykorzystany ka≈ºdego z robaka, jakƒÖ strategie obierzemy w walce.

[h1]Podsumowanie:[/h1]

Worms Clan Wars to ciekawy tytu≈Ç, prezentujƒÖca klasycznƒÖ rozgrywkƒô jakƒÖ znamy z innych czƒô≈õci worms, lecz tym razem wiƒôkszy nacisk jest skierowany na rozgrywki klanowe (online).

Mnie niestety powy≈ºszy tytu≈Ç nie urzek≈Ç, wolƒô klasyczna dobra rozgrywkƒô ni≈º starcia klanowe, w {moim zdaniem)	lepszych ods≈Çonach gry o robakach jak: Worms Reloaded czy nowszego Worms W.M.D ‚Äì ale to tylko moje zdanie.

review:
It is a fun game, filled with nostalgia from the first worm game i played in the 90s
now, is it worth it?
really fun to play with friends, but at this point in time, the game has gotten old and not many like playing it. multiplayer achievements are technically impossible.
if your friends have this game too and are interested, then give it a go. otherwise you'll be stuck with the local play with AI being your only enemy...
also, surprisingly, less than 2% of users have completed the story mode, which is curious to say the least

author: {'steamid': '76561198134427194', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 1175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 911, 'last_played': 1593663075}
review:
As a older Worms game this one has pretty much everything you expect.
AI that can make impossible shots : Yes
Completely wacky physics : Yes
AI using every second of timer : Yes
Super easy story that turns into the hardest game mankind has ever seen : Yes
All and all Worms is a really fun game but this one has no online presents anymore so completing the last few achievements is a joke.
I would rate this on par with Worms Revolution in terms of mechanics although Revolution is a superior game  in the way of replayability.


7 out of 10

review:
[h1]Stare [strike]nie takie dobre [/strike] robaczki. [/h1]
Ka≈ºdy, kto za plecami ma trochƒô wiosen, na pewno kojarzy Wormsy - jak nie te, to inne.

O grze za wiele powiedzieƒá nie mo≈ºna, muzyczka jest w≈Ça≈õciwie tylko jakim≈õ bardzo odleg≈Çym dodatkiem, grafika trzyma sw√≥j specyficzny poziom, a sama rozgrywka jest chaotyczna tak jak zawsze - co jest bardzo dobre.
Z dodatkowych urozmaice≈Ñ, mo≈ºna r√≥wnie≈º dopisaƒá mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá personalizacji w≈Çasnej ekipy - ich wyglƒÖdu, "klas" a nawet g≈Ços√≥w i tekst√≥w (kt√≥re bez problemu pobierzemy przez warsztat), dziƒôki czemu nasza gra stanie siƒô jeszcze bardziej zabawna.
Pozytywnym urozmaiceniem sƒÖ tutaj osiƒÖgniƒôcia steamowe, kt√≥re zachƒôcajƒÖ aby spƒôdziƒá w Wormsach jeszcze trochƒô czasu, kt√≥rego i tak po≈õwiƒôca siƒô sporo - w moim przypadku jakie≈õ 15H i to g≈Ç√≥wnie w trybie fabularnym; pojedynek zagra≈Çem w≈Ça≈õciwie raz.
Jedynym minusem, jest tutaj nieuczciwa konkurencja w postaci gracza sterowanego przez komputer - wystrza≈Çy pocisk√≥w czy rzuty granatami sƒÖ idealnie odmierzone, przez co momentami mo≈ºna siƒô zniechƒôciƒá, gdy widzimy, ≈ºe przeciwnik na 99% trafi i zada maksymalne obra≈ºenia.

author: {'steamid': '76561198173048166', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 2043, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 493, 'last_played': 1577464750}
review:
Annoying but fun, challenging and addictive. You need to be very careful because you can easily screw thangs up. Kinda reminds me of Spelunky. It is very fun in multiplayer and you can customize your worms (for example: give them hilarious names). There are some puzzles and tricks in most of the levels, so you need to have a good strategy and have a lot of nerves. I like the narrator because of the dark humour and the story is nice. Overall, it's pretty cool game.

CONS: It crashes sometimes and there are no online matches available.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085367707', 'num_games_owned': 778, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 943, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1597596484}
review:
Worms Clan Wars tr√°s novamente elementos cl√°ssicos da franquia, como a jogabilidade em 2D e textos bem humorados, mas aposta pouco em novidades, com quase nenhuma adi√ß√£o em rela√ß√£o ao Revolution.

Os gr√°ficos renovados e os cen√°rios agora n√£o s√£o mais est√°ticos como n√≥s t√≠tulos anteriores, possuindo plataformas e diversos outros mecanismos que se movem, dando um maior dinamismo √†s partidas.

No modo campanha, s√£o 25 miss√µes no total, com uma trama que diz respeito aos planos mal√©ficos de uma minhoca que pretende roubar um artefato m√°gico nos museus de cada per√≠odo para assim poder controlar todas as outras minhocas.

Desta forma, os cen√°rios s√£o divididos em cinco tem√°ticas diferentes, sendo elas a Pr√© Hist√≥ria, Viking, Ind√≠gena, Idade m√©dia e Industrial. Por√©m a hist√≥ria n√£o tem seriedade alguma e serve, na verdade, como um pretexto para as batalhas acontecerem.

Al√©m do modo de campanha, o jogo tamb√©m tr√°s miss√µes do Worm Ops que s√£o desafios mais curtos em que se deve concluir a fase de formas espec√≠ficas, como por exemplo, usando determinada arma ou item.

O jogo tr√°s muitas op√ß√µes para mais de um jogador, seja local ou online, inclusive permitindo a cria√ß√£o de cl√£s, que funcionariam como um time fixo. No entanto, a comunidade online j√° viu dias melhores e se encontra atualmente vazia, n√£o sendo nada f√°cil achar partidas.

Quem ficou de fora desta vez, apesar de j√° ter aparecido em outros lan√ßamentos do passado, foi a dublagem brasileira, e certamente  vai deixar com saudades os jogadores j√° acostumados com as frases inusitadas tais como ‚ÄúVoc√™ n√£o me escapa!‚Äù.

No geral, Clan Wars tr√°s pequenas evolu√ß√µes em rela√ß√£o ao seu antecessor, mas nada que seja realmente marcante ou relevante, de forma que est√° mais para uma vers√£o definitiva do Revolution do que um novo jogo propriamente dito. √â um t√≠tulo bastante divertido de qualquer maneira. BOM (7/10).

review:
Un port a linux horrible, el rendimiento es completamente nefasto, tiene muchos bugs en el codigo porque muchas veces se congela el juego, tal como pensaba Team17 esta lleno de programadores inutiles.

La moraleja ni√±os es que no hay que comprar juegos para linux de estudios que no dan un buen soporte, en todo caso si los veis en persona alguna vez podeis preguntarles como es posible que sean tan inutiles siendo su trabajo xD.

review:
Capitolo bellissimo di una grande saga storica!

Non sar√† il migliore di tutta la saga, ma ha quel tocco di freschezza e di diverso che aggiunge parecchie variabili in pi√π alla partita; la fisica dei liquidi offre spunti molto interessanti e la presenza delle soundbank (che mi sarebbe piaciuto veder riproposte anche in WMD) offre anche un tocco di ilarit√† in pi√π al comparto sonoro.

10/10 would lanciare una banana usando un verme con la voce di Giorgio Mastrota again

(PS: Se avete degli amici con cui giocare, dopo un paio di game non ne avrete in pi√π, ma se conoscete Worms penso che abbiate gi√† messo in conto quest'eventualit√†)

author: {'steamid': '76561198272128966', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1562063809}
review:
Better than nothing... but not really a fan of the editions like this one that don't allow setting infinite move time and near-infinite round time for setting up some really gritty modes.

They should also turn off the extra dirt in the UI when not playing with coin drops.  It makes them look really stupid having that extra junk in weapons selector... oh, wait, the UI designers ARE really stupid for not doing this in the first place.  And what's with the use of angle brackets in the UI text?  Looks really sloppy.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970738873', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1560910887}
review:
Now, if you're looking for a more modern Worms game, then this one is pretty good.
While it doesn't seem to have as many in-game items, it does have Workshop support, so that should be easily fixed.
Supporting everything as of 2019, it offers HD res and modern graphic settings.

It seems to lose a little of the charm of the earlier titles though, although I can't put my finger on why.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014693317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 1374, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1001, 'last_played': 1579697898}
review: I'm not recommending this one as it's so bugged. Some of the bugs are really annoying, as you need to start game from the start, because you've to wait eternaly for the neverending turn (usually that's CPU's (in the story mode), but it can be also during anyone's turn) to complete. There are some problems with the controls (rope and so on), bugged crates (this is the root of the above mentioned bug, as a lot of projectiles (for example: cluster grenade parts) aren't exploding, as they should, but just getting stuck in there), unphisically moving fluid/water and so on... Team 17 just couldn't make anything better then Worms Armageddon.

review: Tried to play through single-player campaign and dropped it. Incased Worms mission is a pinnacle of bad level design in this game. Although, maybe there are even worse missions later on, I don't know, I wouldn't be surprised. That is to add to awful controls, UI and camera, pointless and ugly 3D presentation, bad physics and slow and stupid AI. Feels worse in many aspects than the very first Worms game as I remember it (not too nostalgically). I am now on a quest to find a good Worms game, wondering if one even exists.

review: Being the second Worms game I play, I can only say this one has a story and you need to complete missions. For it's price on discount, it's a good pickup if you're looking for some Worms action.

Worms Clan Wars is a game developed and published by Team 17 Digital Ltd.

The game offers some pleasant graphics and really vibrant colours, although some ugly glitches here and there, it is pleasant all the same

The game does suffer with some repetitiveness at certain areas of the game but a fun game nonetheless

Worms Clan Wars overall, however, is a fun game to play, yet sometimes flawed, but is a great strategy game to play in short bursts!

author: {'steamid': '76561198403024518', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1546293104}

author: {'steamid': '76561198085490175', 'num_games_owned': 541, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 6563, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3138, 'last_played': 1699686185}
review:
Pros: Very fun game, also pretty cheap in the frequent sales. Includes Multiplayer as well as Singleplayer. Has very many options to customize your gaming experience. The game has a surprisingly high gameplay-depth which will surprise you with little tricks and new strategies even a few dozen hours in it while it doesn't really give you a lot of info about those gameplay basics itself if you don't want to sit through the tiring Singleplayer-tutorials. You may want to go check out one of the guides available.

Cons: Barely any players available online (go play between 9 o' clock PM and 1 o' clock AM if you want to find any matches, the rest of the time the lobby-list is just a barren wasteland) and if you try to find a game as solo-player you'll always get kicked out of the few open lobbies people have opened for their friends. (Or even worse, they'll team against you unfairly.) Suboptimal technical execution of the game. (I had friends lagging even on high spec computers as it doesn't seem to use graphics cards properly or has a gigantic amount of unnecessary background calculating going on. Also it's worth noting that everything has a bit of a delay, which isn't game breaking though as the game is turn based anyways. Just make sure not to wait until the last second of your turn to take your action and then start complaining that the camera didn't scroll out and over to the enemy worm in time.) Rarely the game also has glitches getting one of your worms stuck in a gap they just crawled in themselves or the water can extremely rarely defy physics and keep moving upwards and downwards inside a hole, essentially making it impossible to continue the match as it won't let you start your next turn.

TL;DR: Good and pretty cheap game with quite a few technical flaws and too few people available for playing it online. Can be excellent fun with friends, but please don't be one of those unsocial bastards kicking random single people out of their lobby and especially don't start teaming against solo players with your friends thinking you're so cool for doing it.

review: As a fan of Armaggedon that hadnt touch a Worms game since a long time this was a perfect experience for me. Nice graphics, every worm is now unique. Enviromental and phisic puzzles are better than ever. Great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053165458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 181, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 181, 'last_played': 1531779753}
review:
I have played many Worms games. The best one to be Worms World Party by far.

This one is, honestly, the worst I have ever played.

It's like none of the producers of this game ever played an old Worms game. They put in some really ugly 3D models for the worms, ugly 3D water which nobody wanted and finally removed every good feature, like the many ways to customize like EVERYTHING in the game.

It's just sad to see what this game has become. 

0/10 would never recommend.

author: {'steamid': '76561198305281749', 'num_games_owned': 304, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1496686761}
review: This game had promise, but on my laptop, despite it being a basic 2D game, it was horrendously optimized, like seriously bad. author: {'steamid': '76561198012460330', 'num_games_owned': 337, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 4316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3217, 'last_played': 1692021033}
review:
By far the best Worms game in the series, no game other than WCW has provided such long and repeatable laughter and fun. No matter how you play, who you play with or the settings you choose there is always never ending fun and new things to try. Best played over voice chat with a friend or family member, it's entertainment for all ages. 

Boosted with a humorous and charming soundtrack, pretty visuals and the ability to create and customize your own landscapes to your liking. If you don't feel like creating your own map or playing one of the great randomly generated Worms maps, there is a wealth of extra content available through the Steam Workshop. From Landscapes to Worm customizations.

Games are typically short, allowing for an intense experience, every turn could mean your loss or win of the match. Not to include the random crate spawns around the map. You never know what lies beneath, it could give you a serious advantage in firepower, coins to purchase new weapons or the ability to move around in sticky situations.

I would recommend this game to groups of friends and families, it's where it truly shines

author: {'steamid': '76561198031569409', 'num_games_owned': 844, 'num_reviews': 213, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1463187186}
review:
This is a Worms Revolution 1.5. Still a average Worms with ugly graphics.

The solo campaign, like in Revolution, is very interesting, for a Worms game. But not the multiplayer section...

It's almost exactly like its predecessor, Worms Revolution : the class-system (A very bad concept for random deathmatches, but a good one for scripted solo compaign),  dynamic water (that was cool) and water-related weapons ; 

What's new ? Little tweaks about physics and classes, bigger maps availables, and some useles features : like beeing part of a Clan (but given that nobody play it anymore, it's useless) and basically, if your are ready to pay all the shitload of DLC in Revolution, Revolution seems to have more content,better themes and more options to customize.

In fact, i don't really understand the point of this game. It's like what WWP was to Armaggedon. Guess what ? People continue playing Armgaddeon, and WWP is dead. 

So, which one to buy ?

If you want to try theses new concepts and you hesitate between buying Revolution or Clan Wars, I would say go for Clan Wars ; 
But if you already have Revolution, buy Clan Wars only if u loved and finished Revolution campaigns, and still want more. That's it.

For playing against humans, play Reloaded (very basic, maybe too much) or W.MP (it's like Reloaded but with new optionnal features, like map-buildings, turrets, vehicules, in-game crafting)  instead, thoses are great games (or Armageddon if you are a hardcome ninja-rope gamer stuck in the 90's)

author: {'steamid': '76561198014801340', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 1614, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 20, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1709845431}
review:
Ich rezensiere ja eigentlich ungern Spiele negativ, da ich wei√ü, wie viel Arbeit drinsteckt und ich nach dem Motto lebe "Wenn du nix Gutes zu sagen hast, sag lieber gar nix". Aber in der Worms Reihe stecken f√ºr mich viele Kindheitserinnerungen (Worms 1 mit der ikonischen Musik und den superwitzigen Videos habe ich wirklich geliebt). Und dieses Spiel macht einfach leider so vieles falsch.

- Die Steuerung ist wirklich furchtbar. Springen mit Shift-Links?! Wer hat sich das denn ausgedacht? Ja-ha, man kann die Steuerung √§ndern, aber dann funktionieren Waffen pl√∂tzlich nicht mehr (Story-Mission, das Ufo in einer der ersten Missionen lie√ü sich erst benutzen, als ich die Steuerung auf Default zur√ºckgestellt hatte).
- Es fehlt s√§mtliche wiedererkennbare Musik und der alte Humor wurde durch eine komische Pseudo-Grabr√§uberin ersetzt, die aus irgendeinem Grund alles kommentiert
- Viele R√§tsel echt einfach nur unn√∂tig schwer. Nicht in erster Linie der R√§tsel wegen, sondern weil man null Hinweise bekommt, was man tun soll.
- Ich finde es gut, dass es unterschiedliche Klassen von W√ºrmern gibt - aber h√§tte man √ºber deren Eigenheiten nicht etwas besser informiert werden k√∂nnen? Dass die Kundschafter erheblich weniger Schaden beim Dragonball-Angriff machen als die Schl√§ger h√§tte man durchaus mal erw√§hnen k√∂nnen.
- Aktuell h√§nge ich an  einer Mission, in der man eine Typen aus einem Reifen retten muss. Nachdem ich knapp innerhalb des Zeitlimits alle Gegner besiegt habe und eigentlich das Ende der Mission erwarte, sagt mir das Spiel einfach nicht, wie es weitergeht? Der Typ s√§uft einfach ab. Tja, schade. 
- Warum muss es mit jedem Spiel neue Waffen geben, die immer taktischer werden? Was ist mit dem guten alten Betonesel oder Armageddon? Wieso braucht es jetzt Telekinese, Tele-Tausch und Ufo?

Zumindest der Story-Modus ist definitiv nicht zu empfehlen. Die Missionen sind einfach zu schei√üe.

Okay, ein oder zwei Dinge hat das Spiel auch richtig gemacht, zum Beispiel:
+ Wasser als Umgebungselement hat mir gut gefallen - Wasserkanonen erweitern zwar auch das Arsenal (siehe oben), aber hier kann man es verschmerzen. Jeder mag das Gef√ºhl, einen Haufen W√ºrmer mit einem Schwall Wasser in den Abgrund zu spritzen
+ Das Level-Design ist ganz nett

Insgesamt: Das Spiel und damit meine ich insbesondere den Story-Modus ist nicht zu empfehlen, auch  nicht f√ºr 5 ‚Ç¨. Wie viel Spa√ü das Spiel online macht, wei√ü ich nicht und werde ich vermutlich auch nicht herausfinden. F√ºr mich ist das ein "minderwertiger Sohn gr√∂√üerer Herren".  So wie Th√©oden. Nur uncooler.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063209433', 'num_games_owned': 601, 'num_reviews': 235, 'playtime_forever': 236, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1617482520}
review:
The game is broken and completely unplayable - it hangs on the first loading screen after finishing the tutorial.
We can see the bug was reported here in [b]report bugs[/b] section more than a year ago https://steamcommunity.com/app/233840/discussions/1/1290691308579921472/ and here https://steamcommunity.com/app/233840/discussions/1/1290691308584156386/

There is not even a single developer reaction. I originally thought it's happening because I use Arch Linux (a distro not supported officially) so I jumped into my Ubuntu 18.04 LTS x64 partition and it's exactly the same. I'd be ok if it was only happening on Arch because it's a rolling release distro but the current Ubuntu LTS is a necessity and it should work 100%.

You disappointed me Team17 after the perfect port of Worms Reloaded. I will try reporting this issue using alternative methods and will refund the game if I won't get an official reaction in a week.
I will update the review as soon as I get some news but for now I can't recommend it, it's a waste of money right now.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992277997', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 127, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1534592925}
review:
[h1]DO NOT BUY THIS GAME!!![/h1]
(Unless of course you happen to live in Wakefield, UK, close to the Team17 Studio - then at least you could easily take your and everyone else's rage and frustration out on them afterwards.)

The HUGE problem with this game is that, no matter how low you turn your settings, on many setups the game for no good reason runs in slideshow mode giving you a whopping <10fps (and yes, ladies and gentlemen, that's on a highly-specced system of 2017). The devs have been on it for 5 years now without any results. Just check out the discussion board which will back this claim up.
Of course how dare I compare The Witcher 3 with all settings maxed in 4k to the pristine specimen that is Worms Clan Wars. But I digress.

Another thing - what good are turn timers if you have to wait 3-4 seconds on the weapon select screen for a popup to appear so you can try to figure out what a particular weapon icon even is? Not the right weapon for you? No problem, just wait another 3-4 seconds to see what the next one is. It's not like we're in a rus..... wait what? Turn's over?

I totally didn't mention the fact that you get started off with a seemingly unskippable tutorial which gets you stuck when failing to ninja rope caused by all input latency going up by one second as soon as the rope is attached. Your ninja rope will then disappear never to return getting you stuck in a pit - forever. Only then, when you attempt to quit the game out of frustration it turns out that trying to do so just ends the tutorial - exactly what you wanted to do in the first place.

Admittedly, it does introduce some nice new ideas into the Worms genre - even though I really don't care for the 3D aesthetic and wannabe high-accuracy physics simulation in a game like this. And that's really the only good thing I can say about it - nice idea but abyssmal execution - do your sanity a favor and return to Worms Reloaded / Armageddon.

Team 17 should really just stick to publishing at this point and stop ruining their own name even further if they don't have anyone who can write a proper games anymore. Just keep mooching off of other's genious like with Ghost Town Game's Overcooked and Overcooked 2.

Solucanlarƒ± √ße≈üitlendirmek mantƒ±klƒ± kesinlikle. Y√ºksek damage veya hareketlilik a√ßƒ±sƒ±ndan solucanlarƒ±n farklƒ± olu≈üu, taktikselliƒüe bamba≈üka bir boyut kazandƒ±rƒ±yor.

Senaryolarda aƒüƒ±r silahlarƒ±n (muz bombasƒ±, holy grenade, e≈ü≈üek) daha √ßok kullanƒ±lƒ±yor olu≈üu ise eminim t√ºm Worms sevenlerin ho≈üuna gidecektir.
Yeni seriye olumsuz bakanlarƒ±n konusuna deƒüinmek istiyorum. Bu oyunlardan oynadƒ±ktan sonra Armageddon veya World Party oynamayƒ± denemi≈üler mi bir sormak lazƒ±m. Denedim ve oynanabilirlikteki d√º≈ü√º≈üe hayret ettim. Evet, ben de eski oyunlarƒ±n sevicisiyim ama eskide kalmƒ±≈ü bu oyunlarƒ±n yerini tutmadƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± d√º≈ü√ºnerek ≈üimdiki oyunlara olumsuz atan g√ºruh, aslƒ±nda eski seriyi deƒüil √ßocukluƒüunu √∂zl√ºyor. O zevki geri getiremeyeceksiniz malesef. Deneyin ve farkƒ± g√∂r√ºn. Halen Armageddon ve World Party'nin Reloaded, Revolution ve Clan Wars'tan daha iyi olduƒüunu d√º≈ü√ºnenler kusura bakmasƒ±n, oyundan anlamƒ±yorlar demektir. GTA 4'e GTA 5'ten daha g√ºzel demek gibi bir ≈üey olur bu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198012924010', 'num_games_owned': 717, 'num_reviews': 319, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 228, 'last_played': 1587761498}
review:
Die Worms-Reihe ist eine lustig gestaltete und am√ºsante Art von Spiel, welche sich besonders mit Freunden gut genie√üen l√§sst. Das gegenseite Verspotten und begl√ºckw√ºnschen macht nach schwierigen Sch√ºssen und gleicherma√üen verfehlten Blindg√§ngern Spa√ü und gute Laune. Der Teil "Clan Wars" bietet viele verschieden Items, Freiheit, was gestaltung der Maps und Spieleinstellungen angeht und sowohl einen Funktionierenden Multiplayer als auch einen Singleplayer. Die Graphik ist nicht grandios, ist aber devinitiv verkraftbar. Ich empfehle es allen Leuten, die Kollegen zum Spielen haben. Einzelg√§ngern w√ºrde ich eher ein anderes Spiel ans Herz legen.


Wenn ich es Zocke Stream ich es auch www.twitch.tv/zumlustigenschnitzlwirt

author: {'steamid': '76561198043096944', 'num_games_owned': 507, 'num_reviews': 218, 'playtime_forever': 967, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 967, 'last_played': 1528620870}
review:
Routiniertes sowie spa√üiges Worms. Wer ein Worms ala Reloaded erwartet, sollte seine Anspr√ºche vielleicht ein wenig runterfahren. Worms konzentriert sich genau auf das was es kann und f√ºhrt dies eben auch wie gewohnt aus. Warum soll man dann seine Anspr√ºche etwas herunterfahren? Ganz einfach, in der reinen Kampagne empfand ich die Missionen zu √§hnlich, wenn auch nicht schlecht gemacht, die Frustmomente waren zwar in Reloaded auch vorhanden, aber hier ist die Atmosph√§re nicht ganz so dicht und zudem nicht ganz so motivierend, sodass der Funke wie in Reloaded nicht so ganz her√ºbersprang. Knapp 16 Stunden habe ich mir f√ºr die Story zeit gelassen und bin nun froh, es geschafft zu haben.
Wer gerne Worms spielt und mehr vom Universum haben m√∂chte, ist hier genau richtig, wer neu bei der Reihe ist, sollte zumindest von den neuen erstmal Reloaded spielen, bzw. warten bis Worms Clan Wars rabattiert ist.

Wertung: 73 / 100

[i] The return to the worms was a nice change for me. A long time ago I played this title and I had a lot of fun because of it and nothing has changed. Now there is nothing more left to do than try Worms W.M.D :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198139344280', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 207, 'playtime_forever': 1758, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1357, 'last_played': 1641050648}
review:
[h1][b]Worms Clan Wars[/b] - Im Soge des Wurms[/h1]

[i]Clan Wars[/i] ist der zweitneueste Ableger der altehrw√ºrdigen Worms-Reihe aka "Waas, das gibt schon Fallschaden!?" oder "Wie fliegt man dieses Superschaf bitte nicht gegen die n√§chstbeste Wand??". Im Gegensatz zum aktuellen Ableger [i]W.M.D[/i], der mit umfangreichem Crafting und begehbaren Geb√§uden einiges anders macht, kann man Clan Wars im Grunde als ein ziemlich klassischer Teil in die Strategiereihe einordnen. 

[b]Der Name war Programm[/b]
Eine der gr√∂√üten Neuerungen, die Entwickler [i]Team17[/i] ins Spiel gebracht hat, ist der ausgebaute Online-Modus. So l√§sst sich nun ein eigener Clan mit allem Drum und Dran gr√ºnden. Allzu genau m√∂chte ich auf dieses Feature aber gar nicht eingehen, denn leider habe ich trotz mehreren Versuchen kein Clan-Match gefunden. Viereinhalb Jahre nach Release haben sich die Spieler interessanterweise ziemlich gleichm√§√üig auf alle m√∂glichen Worms-Ableger aufgeteilt (mit [i]Armageddon[/i] als positver Ausrei√üer nach oben) - f√ºr regelm√§√üige Online-Matches im Clan-Modus reicht die Spieleranzahl leider nicht mehr. Im normalen Online-Multiplayer finden sich dagegen zumindest abends weiterhin Matches.
Damit geht dem Spiel eine prominente Neuerung also leider ab. Wer noch kein Worms-Spiel in seiner Bibliothek hat und wem W.M.D zu viel anders macht, dem kann ich Clan Wars allerdings trotzdem empfehlen. Das klassische Gameplay und unkaputtbare Spielprinzip macht auch nach etlichen Jahren noch richtig viel Spa√ü und durch neue Waffen und Physik-Verbesserungen wurde immer wieder neues Holz nachgelegt. Zum Beispiel w√§re da das vorbildliche und nachvollziehbare Wasser-Verhalten als Spielelement zu nennen. Als neues Gadget gibt es daf√ºr neben neun weiteren Vernichtungshelfern das Aqua Pack, mit dem im Jetpack-Stil gegnerische W√ºrmer von der Map geschwemmt werden k√∂nnen. Au√üerdem k√∂nnen die wabbeligen Weichtiere nat√ºrlich weiterhin auf das sehr umfangreiche und einfallsreiche Waffenarsenal mit Klassikern wie der Bazooka, Bananen-Bombe oder Heiligen Handgranate zur√ºckgreifen. Diese Auswahl in Verbindung mit den Eigenschaften der jeweiligen Wurm-Typen und den Gegebenheiten der Maps sorgen f√ºr taktische Tiefe und die Qual der Wahl bei der Suche nach der richtigen Waffe f√ºr die richtige Situation. F√ºr Neulinge kann dieser Umstand aber auch frustrierend sein, denn eine M√∂glichkeit, alle Gadgets ohne Risiko auf Verlust in Ruhe zu testen, gibt es nicht. In der Kampagne oder bei den Wurm-Ops ist das zwar begrenzt m√∂glich (dazu unten mehr) aber eine risikofreie Spielwiese, um vielleicht sogar das verdammte Superschaf unter Kontrolle zu bringen, gibt es nicht.

[b]Von Schwankungen und Wendungen[/b]
In puncto Spielmodi wird auch abseits der gro√üteils verwaisten Clans einiges geboten. Zum einen ist da der klassische, lokale Multiplayer, der sicherlich schon den einen oder anderen Familienfrieden gef√§hrdet hat. Dazu kommt der regul√§re Online-Modus, der durch viele Einstellungsm√∂glichkeiten (z.B. nur Bazookas und Granaten) individualisiert werden kann. Zumindest im popul√§ren Deathmatch-Modus war hier die Spielersuche wie oben erw√§hnt bei mir kein Problem.
Auch Singleplayer-Liebhabern will Worms Clan Wars etwas bieten und f√§hrt dazu eine umfangreiche Kampagne auf. Storym√§√üig sollte man nicht allzu viel erwarten, denn die Jagd auf den b√∂sen Lord Mesmer und seine heimt√ºckischen Pl√§ne verl√§uft nahezu ohne jeglichen Spannungsbogen. Etwas Charme bekommt die Geschichte nur durch unsere gierige aber recht unterhaltsame Auftraggeberin Tara Pinkle und die ulkige Natur unserer W√ºrmer. Das Leveldesign der Kampagnenmissionen hat mich anfangs negativ √ºberrascht und sich eher wie ein halbherziges Tutorial angef√ºhlt. Nach einigen Abschnitten wurden die Level jedoch interessanter und fordernder. Letztendlich blieben bei mir nach der je nach Skill und/oder Tollpatschigkeit etwa zehn Stunden langen Tournee gemischte Eindr√ºcke zur√ºck. Einige Level waren frustrierend schwer, von Bugs geplagt oder haben nicht so recht in das Rundenstrategie-System des Spiels gepasst - auf der anderen Seite gab es aber auch wirklich spa√üige Abschnitte, die so in normalen Matches kaum zustande kommen w√ºrden. Am besten mal selbst reinspielen und sich nicht von den lahmen, ersten Level abschrecken lassen.
Die Wurm-Ops-Missionen haben ein √§hnliches Bild abgegeben: oft banal und einfach und in einem bis zwei F√§llen daf√ºr einfach nur d√§mlich und frustrierend. Nach Abschluss war ich tats√§chlich ein besserer Wurm an der Bazooka oder mit der Granate - der Spa√ü blieb aber teilweise auf der Strecke.
Zuletzt aber noch ein lobendes Wort: Die [i]Steam Workshop[/i]-Integration erlaubt ein umfassendes, buntes Anpassen unserer Lieblings-Wutw√ºrmer mit Voice-Samples, Dekoartikel und eigenen Karten aus der Community. Eine gute Entscheidung von Team17!

FAZIT
[h1]Clankriege finden in Worms Clan Wars leider eher nicht mehr statt. Der im Vergleich zu W.M.D ziemlich klassische Spielablauf und das zeitlose Waffen-Arsenal machen Clan Wars aber trotzdem lohnenswert f√ºr Spieler, die noch kein Worms in der Bibliothek haben und ein halbwegs aktuelles Game suchen, das sich trotzdem nicht zu sehr vom ersten Teil entfernt![/h1]

WERTUNG
[h1]75[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197972282142', 'num_games_owned': 892, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 1009, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 992, 'last_played': 1663500350}
review:
I have all the Worms games on Xbox and play them mostly on there, so ignore my low hours on the PC versions - they are not a true pointer to the time spent in the game.

Of all the Worms games, including WMD, this is my absolute fave. I love it. There's something about the water physics that really makes it stand out. The only other good water physics game I know of is ORGANIC PANIC, and it's done even better in that game - shame the game itself isn't very good.

The water in this makes for some outstanding situations. WMD is just a repetition on the formula - this game contains a tangent that makes it stand out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047690060', 'num_games_owned': 404, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 3042, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2815, 'last_played': 1550644523}
review:
[h1] Worms Clan Wars	[/h1]
[i] Saving Private Worm.	[/i]

[b] Pros:	[/b]
Campaign is both challenging and enjoyable.
Workshop maps made for some interesting duels.
Voice packs and cosmetics from the workshop brought instant replay value.

[b] Cons:	[/b]
Latency isn't handled well and results in REALLY slow games.
Friends not loading in properly sometimes was a minor inconvenience.

[b] Overall Rating:	[/b]7/10

review:
Well it's pretty fun but if you plan on playing vs the AI, then you better stay away. The AI gets permenent electromagnets, meaning, they just have to put one of these down once, and they are virtually invincible forever. It's possible to subvert this with digging etc but virtually impossible most of the time. 


Really makes the game junk.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091395938', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 2541, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 737, 'last_played': 1523204916}
review:
Die Men√º Steuerung ist ne zumutung vor allem im Karten Editor mit nem Gamepad. 
Die Story hat nichts zu bieten ausser Teils unfaire Sprung-passagen und try and die M√ºll. 
Es gibt nur eine Handvoll Landschaftstyppen und bei einiegen sind Vorder und Hintergrund kaum zu Unterscheiden, vorallem f√ºr Leute mit Farbschw√§che oder Farbenblindheit ist die Asia Landschaft eine Zumutung und die Pr√§historische Landschaft ist nur geringf√ºgig besser was bedeutet das nur Industrie, Vikinger und Maya landschafts typen √ºberbleiben, was ein Witz ist. Es gibt Demos mit mehr Umfang. 
Die neuen Waffen im Vergleich zum classiker Worms Armageddon sind kaum erw√§hnenswert und machen den sonstiegen fehlenden Umfang nicht wieder gut. Hinzu kommt das man keine eigenen KI Teams mehr machen kann, was sehr Schade ist und die KI ist extrem langsam, Sie braucht die 3 fache Zeit um einen Zug zu planen als in Worms 2 zum Vergleich. Die KI hat sich also enorm zur√ºckentwickelt und es gibt auch keine Schewierigkeitsgrade mehr.

Viel schlechter als Viele Vorg√§nger Titel. Worms W.M.D oder die Klassiker sind Viel besser.

review: This game is just flat out bad. Can't rebind the controls because it doesn't allow for double binding which often temporarily needs to  be done. My friends and I had trouble connecting to each others game and when we finally did it crashed upon starting. Once we got in the game there were all sorts of graphical errors and bugs. This game isn't worth the time or headaches to play. Worms used to be good but that time is no longer. Do not buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053265014', 'num_games_owned': 1339, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1487716224}
review: This episode is... okay. Not as fine as the old classic ones, but I think the good ideas introduced in Revolution are still saving it (I skipped Revolution, so these were new for me) - the water weapons, the buying system (weapons/utils for gold coins), some creative tools like Stick Up, although there are useless ones too (UFO, Winged Monkey, and Telekinesis never proved to be useful thus far). Some negative points are present, like physics/control bugs, and I didn't particularly like the graphic style either. However, if you catch this episode in a sale, it does worth a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198028794153', 'num_games_owned': 1089, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1496514217}
review: Got this for cheap, so not super disappointed... but still I am. Almost every element of this game is annoying, which I suppose is to be expected on a thematic level, but not on a gameplay level. The "campaign" is an endless slog of bad jokes and poorly designed levels... it seems at one point the developers were trying to make a platformer, but repurposed those ideas for a bland and slow turn-based experience. In my experience, a game should be fun before it should be funny.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993689485', 'num_games_owned': 1435, 'num_reviews': 77, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1609839528}
review:
I really wanted to like this game since I've been a worms fan since worms 2. The humour and music are there, but the graphics are cringy to me. Even after changing the resolution to 1080p and switching on anti-aliasing I could still see jagged edges. I understand the game is four years old, but it felt unforgivable. Despite the issues, I really enjoyed worms reloaded on release, but I can't recommend this. The gameplay feels arduously slow and the worm ops mission feel like a chore. Maybe it opens up later, but it didn't make me want to stick around to find out.

UPDATE: on spending some more time in the story missions I can see the core worms gameplay is intact. I have no interest in online multiplayer, so if you are looking for worms to play online, this may be worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970330504', 'num_games_owned': 391, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1521403922}
review:
One of the worst  examples of this game.
I can't comment on mulitplayer as i gave up before that.
Theres no weapon information, no options to setup on vs mode, its very plain.
Game play wise, its mostly ok but will some weird clipping and hit detection issues - nothing major though.
Its just slower than previous versions.

World party or armageddon still better in my books.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123357146', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 27, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1495742240}
review:
MP mode causes the game to crash on Mac, both creating a Lobby and joining one. This has been a known issue to the developers since 2015, but seemingly hasn't been worked on since 2016 anymore.

Game is full of bugs (both for Win and Mac), explosion sounds are missing randomly and visual glitches seem to be common.

Hitboxes fail regularly, causing for example the baseball bat to miss despite standing right next to a worm and swinging right through it.

A game like this shouldn't be sold on Steam in my opinion.

review:
Ich bin mit Worms aufgewachsen und ein grosser Fan. Leider kann ich "Clan Wars" nicht empfehlen.

- Der online Multiplayer funktioniert nur wenn man Gl√ºck hat
- Die Spiellandschaft hebt sich kaum vom Hintergrund ab, das sieht zwar schick aus aber verwirrt beim spielen

Den Daumen runter gibt es vorallem wegen der Gestalltung Spiellandschaft/Hintergrund. Beim herauszoomen kann man teilweise kaum noch erkennen was zum Hintergrund geh√∂rt und was nicht. Das f√ºhrt dann oft dazu dass Angriffe schief gehen wenn z.B. Granaten an einem St√ºck Landschaft abprallen weil man es mit dem Hintergrund verwechselt hat...

Wer gerne Worms spielt sollte IMHO auf "Clan Wars"  verzichten und zu einem anderen Titel der Serie greifen.
